title: Marvell Rallies After Upbeat CEO Remarks, Celestial AI Deal
description: Marvell Technology Inc. rallied in late trading after reassuring investors that its custom chip-design unit is winning repeat orders, signaling continued growth as the company benefits from runaway spending on AI computing.
